instruction: Pat chicken dry with paper towels
Sprinkle little bit salt and pepper on chicken
Wet the pot with oil and heat oil (or butter) on MEDIUM to HIGH heat
Add (onion) (carrots) (celery) then stirring everything until tender (3-4min)
Add chicken stock and bay leaves then season with salt and pepper to taste
Add chicken meat and bring to boil
Reduce heat to MEDIUM and cover the pot for simmer until chicken is cooked (30-40min)
Take chicken out and let it cool
Dicing chicken into bite-size pieces and discard bones
Mix chicken and pasta and cook until tender (6-7min)
Remove the pot from heat; Add (parsley) (dill) (lemon juice); Season with (salt) and (pepper) to taste
Get (onion) (carrots) (celery) ready for the next step
Get (chicken stock) (bay leaves) ready for the next step
Get (chicken) ready for the next step
Prepare cutting board and knife (or something to dice the meat)
Prepare cutting board and knife (or something to dice the meat)
